properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Aha anandame paramanandame priya yesu nosage naku Kolatalenidi buddhikandanidi preman vivarimpa vīlaguna?{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nicha drohinaina nan prematho chercukoni Papa oobi nundi san paiki levanethenu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Naligina relluvale nenu virigeḍu samayamulo Nakai vignapana chesi sthiraparacitivi prematho{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Karu chikaṭivelalo kalata chendina nannu Kachi odarchitive balamaina ni atmato{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nadu prananadhuda ninneppudu ne gantuno Atmapriyuda ninnu chuda aasa naalo kaligenu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Ni prema svaramun vini nenu melukontini Priyuni rommunu cheranu nalo vaancha upponguchunde{/lang-eng}
